title: Dreams Come True
lyrics:
Na issjanh-a
Gakkeum aju ajjilhan sangsang-e ppajyeodeulgon hae
Seuchyeoganeun uli tain-in deus uli
Moleun chae jinachyeo sangsangjocha silh-eo
Neoege naneun eodijjeum

Tto na-ege neoneun eodijjeum

Bunmyeonghae itolog jit-eun hogisim-i

Gijeog-i doel teni ikkeul-eo jul teni

Da ilueo jul teni



Trust nal mid-eojwo i sungan-eul

Kkwag jab-a deo yong-gileul jwo na-ege

Kkumkkuneun ma-eum-eulo

Kkumkkudeon ne pum-eulo ga

Oh nan andoemyeon doege hae



Trust in me Trust in you

Ulin eotteohgedeun kkog manna

Chaj-anaelge dallyeogalge

Oh nan ganghaejyeo neo ttaem-e



Nan machi eodum sog-e

Ppajyeoissneun geos gat-i (Trust)

Andoeneungeon tto andoeneun geos

Sesang-ui daedab gachiga eobsneun

Nega eobsneun kkum-eun kkwodo

Amuleon bich-i eobsneun

Neolaneun sesang an-eseo

Nan balago iss-eo an doeneun geon eobs-eo



Neoege naneun imankeum tto

Na-ege neoneun imankeum

Bunmyeonghae musimko heullin nae balaem-i

Gijeog-i doel teni ikkeul-eo jul teni

Da ilueo jul teni



Trust nal mid-eojwo i sungan-eul

Kkwag jab-a deo yong-gileul jwo na-ege

Kkumkkuneun ma-eum-eulo

Kkumkkudeon ne pum-eulo ga

Oh nan andoemyeon doege hae



Trust in me Trust in you

Ulin eotteohgedeun kkog manna

Chaj-anaelge dallyeogalge

Oh nan ganghaejyeo neo ttaem-e



Kkeutnae maju bogo seol su iss-eulkka

Haepiending sog-e

Geuleon milaega ulil gidaligil balae

Kkumkkuneun daelo geulyeojil neowa na

Kkumkkuneun daelo da ilwojil geoya

Kkumkkuneun daelo geulyeojil neowa na

Kkumkkuneun daelo da ilwojil geoya



Trust nal mid-eojwo i sungan-eul

Kkwag jab-a deo yong-gileul jwo na-ege

Kkumkkuneun ma-eum-eulo

Kkumkkudeon ne pum-eulo ga

Oh nan andoemyeon doege hae



Trust in me Trust in you

Ulin eotteohgedeun kkog manna

Dolgo dol-agalsulog aeteushaejilsulog joh-a

Oh nan ganghaejyeo neo ttaem-e



Kkumkkuneun daelo da ilwojil geoya u
